Abilities.Name: Healer
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to cure an ally's status condition at the end of a turn.

Abilities.Name: Anticipation
Abilities.Description: This ability warns the user if their opponent knows a 1-hit KO or super effective move.

Abilities.Name: Magic Bounce
Abilities.Description: The user reflects moves that change the status of Pokemom.

Moves.Name: Dazzling Gleam
Moves.Description: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

Moves.Name: Brutal Swing
Moves.Description: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

Moves.Name: Psybeam
Moves.Description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also confuse the target.

Moves.Name: Thunder Wave
Moves.Description: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

Moves.Name: Trick Room
Moves.Description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

Abilities.Name: Levitate
Abilities.Description: The user is immune to Ground-type moves and cannot be damaged by Spikes.

Moves.Name: Night Shade
Moves.Description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

Moves.Name: Hex
Moves.Description: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status conditions.

Moves.Name: Sucker Punch
Moves.Description: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

Moves.Name: Clear Smog
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are eliminated.

Moves.Name: Will-O-Wisp
Moves.Description: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.

Abilities.Name: Sand Stream
Abilities.Description: The user creates a Sandstorm that lasts for 5 turns when it enters the battlefield.

Abilities.Name: Sand Force
Abilities.Description: Increases the damage of the user's Ground-type, Rock-type, and Steel-type moves by 30% during a Sandstorm and the user takes no damage from the Sandstorm.

Moves.Name: Bulldoze
Moves.Description: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.

Moves.Name: Bite
Moves.Description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Take Down
Moves.Description: A reckless full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

Moves.Name: Yawn
Moves.Description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

Abilities.Name: Inner Focus
Abilities.Description: The user is deeply focused and protects itself from flinching.

Abilities.Name: Synchronize
Abilities.Description: The opponent receives the same status condition it gives to the user.

Abilities.Name: Psychic Surge
Abilities.Description: The user applies Psychic Terrain to the battlefield for five turns when it enters a battle.

Moves.Name: Psychic
Moves.Description: The target is hit with a strong telekinetic force to inflict damage. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Moves.Name: Encore
Moves.Description: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.

Moves.Name: Body Slam
Moves.Description: The user attacks by dropping onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Moves.Name: Shadow Ball
Moves.Description: The user attacks by hurling a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Moves.Description: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

Moves.Name: Leer
Moves.Description: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers their Defense stats.

Abilities.Name: Chlorophyll
Abilities.Description: Increases the user's Speed stat under sunshine.

Abilities.Name: Leaf Guard
Abilities.Description: The user prevents status conditions under sunny weather.

Abilities.Name: Infiltrator
Abilities.Description: The user ignores the opponent's protective moves and stat boosts from moves.

Moves.Name: Acrobatics
Moves.Description: The user nimbly strikes the target. This attack does massive damage if the user isn't holding an item.

Moves.Name: Seed Bomb
Moves.Description: The user attacks by slamming a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

Moves.Name: Cotton Spore
Moves.Description: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to opposing Pokémon. This harshly lowers their Speed stats.

Moves.Name: Sunny Day
Moves.Description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type attacks. The sunlight also lowers the power of Water-type attacks.

Abilities.Name: Inner Focus
Abilities.Description: The user is deeply focused and protects itself from flinching.

Abilities.Name: Keen Eye
Abilities.Description: The user ignores the opponent's Evasion boosts and opponents cannot lower the user's Accuracy.

Abilities.Name: Pickpocket
Abilities.Description: The user steals an item from an attacker that makes direct contact.

Moves.Name: Icicle Crash
Moves.Description: The user attacks by crashing large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Ice Shard
Moves.Description: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

Moves.Name: Slash
Moves.Description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws, scythes, or the like. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Moves.Name: Leer
Moves.Description: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers their Defense stats.

Abilities.Name: Snow Warning
Abilities.Description: The user creates a Hailstorm that lasts for 5 turns after being sent out in battle.

Abilities.Name: Soundproof
Abilities.Description: The user is unaffected by Sound-based moves.

Moves.Name: Icy Wind
Moves.Description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers opposing Pokémon's Speed stats.

Moves.Name: Razor Leaf
Moves.Description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at opposing Pokémon. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Moves.Name: Weather Ball
Moves.Description: This move's type and power change depending on the weather at the time the move is used.

Moves.Name: Water Pulse
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: The user lower's the opponent's Attack by one stage whenever it enters the battlefield.

Abilities.Name: Frisk
Abilities.Description: The user can check the opponent's held item when it enters the battlefield.

Abilities.Name: Sap Sipper
Abilities.Description: Increases the user's Attack by one stage if the user gets hit with a Grass-type move, also the user takes no damage from Grass-type attacks.

Moves.Name: Stomp
Moves.Description: The user attacks by stomping on the target with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Psyshock
Moves.Description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This move deals physical damage.

Moves.Name: Bite
Moves.Description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Leer
Moves.Description: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers their Defense stats.

Moves.Name: Reflect
Moves.Description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical moves for five turns.

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: The user lower's the opponent's Attack by one stage whenever it enters the battlefield.

Abilities.Name: Reckless
Abilities.Description: Increases the damage of moves that have recoil damage by 20%.

Moves.Name: Take Down
Moves.Description: A reckless full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

Moves.Name: Aerial Ace
Moves.Description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

Moves.Name: Agility
Moves.Description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply boosts its Speed stat.

Moves.Name: Uproar
Moves.Description: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.

Moves.Name: Growl
Moves.Description: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.

Abilities.Name: Leaf Guard
Abilities.Description: The user prevents status conditions under sunny weather.

Abilities.Name: Oblivious
Abilities.Description: The user cannot be infatuated, intimidated, or be taunted.

Abilities.Name: Sweet Veil
Abilities.Description: Prevents the user and allies from falling asleep.

Moves.Name: Stomp
Moves.Description: The user attacks by stomping on the target with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Teeter Dance
Moves.Description: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses every Pokémon around it.

Moves.Name: Magical Leaf
Moves.Description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.

Moves.Name: Draining Kiss
Moves.Description: The user steals the target's HP with a kiss. The user's HP is restored by over half the damage taken by the target.

Moves.Name: Grassy Terrain
Moves.Description: The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Sturdy
Abilities.Description: The user cannot be knocked out with one hit and cannot be knocked out by One hit KO moves, causing the Pokemon to have 1 HP remaining.

Abilities.Name: Rock Head
Abilities.Description: The user takes receives no recoil damage from recoil damage causing effects.

Abilities.Name: Rattled
Abilities.Description: Increases the user's Speed by one stage if the user gets hit by a Bug-type, Ghost-type, or Dark-type move or if the user gets Intimidated.

Moves.Name: Wood Hammer
Moves.Description: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

Moves.Name: Rock Tomb
Moves.Description: The user hurls boulders at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the target's Speed stat by cutting off its movement.

Moves.Name: Flail
Moves.Description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.

Moves.Name: Harden
Moves.Description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to boost its Defense stat.

Abilities.Name: Chlorophyll
Abilities.Description: Increases the user's Speed stat under sunshine.

Abilities.Name: Solar Power
Abilities.Description: Increases the user's Special Attack by 50% but HP decreases by 12.5% of its max HP at the end of every turn.

Abilities.Name: Early Bird
Abilities.Description: The user gets out of the Sleep condition twice as fast.

Moves.Name: Growth
Moves.Description: The user's body grows all at once, boosting the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

Moves.Name: Giga Drain
Moves.Description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

Moves.Name: Take Down
Moves.Description: A reckless full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

Moves.Name: Earth Power
Moves.Description: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Moves.Name: Sunny Day
Moves.Description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type attacks. The sunlight also lowers the power of Water-type attacks.

Abilities.Name: Mold Breaker
Abilities.Description: The user can use moves without getting affected by the opponent's Abilities.

Abilities.Name: Own Tempo
Abilities.Description: The user cannot be confused and cannot be affected by Intimidate.

Abilities.Name: Pickpocket
Abilities.Description: The user steals an item from an attacker that makes direct contact.

Moves.Name: Slam
Moves.Description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.

Moves.Name: Play Rough
Moves.Description: The user attacks by playing rough with the target. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

Moves.Name: Flash Cannon
Moves.Description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Moves.Name: Brutal Swing
Moves.Description: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

Abilities.Name: Shield Dust
Abilities.Description: The user blocks the additional effects of attacks it receives.

Abilities.Name: Tinted Lens
Abilities.Description: Doubles the damage of "not very effective" moves of the user.

Abilities.Name: Wonder Skin
Abilities.Description: Lowers the accuracy of status inducing moves targeted at the user by 50%.

Moves.Name: Air Slash
Moves.Description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Bug Buzz
Moves.Description: The user vibrates to generate a damaging sound wave. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Moves.Name: Psybeam
Moves.Description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also confuse the target.

Moves.Name: Sleep Powder
Moves.Description: The user scatters a cloud of soporific dust that puts the target to sleep.

Abilities.Name: Immunity
Abilities.Description: The user cannot be poisoned.

Abilities.Name: Toxic Boost
Abilities.Description: Increases the user's Attack by 50% when the user gets poisoned.

Moves.Name: Crush Claw
Moves.Description: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

Moves.Name: Leer
Moves.Description: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers their Defense stats.

Moves.Name: Night Slash
Moves.Description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Moves.Name: Quick Attack
Moves.Description: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

Abilities.Name: Illusion
Abilities.Description: The user enters battle disguised as the last non-fainted Pokemon in the party. The disguise breaks when the user receives damage from an attack but not from weather effects or entry hazards.

Moves.Name: Snarl
Moves.Description: The user yells as if it's ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stats of opposing Pokémon.

Moves.Name: Knock Off
Moves.Description: The user slaps down the target's held item, making it unusable for that battle. This move does more damage if the target has a held item.

Moves.Name: Fury Swipes
Moves.Description: The user attacks by raking the target with claws, scythes, or the like. This move hits two to five times in a row.

Moves.Name: Extrasensory
Moves.Description: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Nasty Plot
Moves.Description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.
